Description of incident: "On April 28, 2016, we learned that a "phishing" email was sent to an employee who responded to the email, thinking that it was a legitimate request. When we learned of this, we immediately secured the email account, reset passwords and began an investigation.  We also notified the Solano County Sheriff's Office which is working with the college Information Department and the Solano County Sheriff's Office Computer Crime Task Force in the investigation of this matter."The information compromised included names, addresses, Social Security numbers and salary information. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-61842
